entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 12:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -42.1°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
